note.p: Education: Lincoln College, Oxford; St Mary's Hall, Oxford. BA (1666), ?MA (1705)

Career: Incumbent of Meare, Somerset (1673-1687); Vicar of Middlezoy, Somerset (1674); Rector of Kilmington, Somerset (1687); Prebendary of Wells (1688); Master of Bruton Free School (1700); Archdeacon of Wells (1705-death); mural monument to his memory in Wells Cathedral, Somerset
